charinfo.name: White Snake Orochimaru
charinfo.description: Like a snake, Orochimaru has shed his skin, revealing his true form; an enormous white snake. As the White Snake, Orochimaru is able to regenerate without end, steal bodies and even revive himself as a dragon-like god.

abilities.name: Regenerative Bite
abilities.description: Orochimaru uses his white snake form to bite an enemy, dealing 35 physical damage and healing himself 35 health.

abilities.name: Living Corpse Reincarnation
abilities.description: Orochimaru targets one enemy for 3 turns, each turn stunning that enemy's non-mental skills, and stealing 15 health from them. This skill will end if Orochimaru dies.

abilities.name: Release of the White Snake
abilities.description: Orochimaru targets one ally, and if their health drops to 25 or below while Orochimaru is dead, that character will heal 75 health, will have all friendly and harmful skills removed from them and will have all their skills replaced. This skill is invisible and cannot be used while active.

abilities.name: Snake Wall
abilities.description: This skill makes White Snake Orochimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.
